ftp_connect: ${user} connected to a FTP host for .
ftp_disconnect: ${user} disconnected from the FTP host for .
ftp_download: ${user} is downloading file(s) from the FTP host for .
ftp_cancel: ${user} cancelled a download from the FTP host for .
ftp_upload_fail: Request to download from a FTP server by ${user} failed to save some files to storage.
ftp_upload_success: Request to download from a FTP server by ${user} finished successfully.
